Title: Good Things in Large Boxes
Description:
Our efforts have created everything we need to open an Earth-Warder's Vault. There are several beneath the Citadel. Locate one and I will reward you.

I have crafted chains to help move it. If you bring the Vault here, we can share in the riches.

Watch for the Vault being moved, as I have dispatched others to find them as well.
ObjectivesText: Locate an Earth-Warder's Vault for me. If you bring it back, we can share in the loot.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Stoker Volrax, with or without the Earth-Warder's Vault.

Objectives.Text: Earth-Warder's Vault returned to Stoker Volrax
